banner.message: Find the perfect place to bring your ideas to life

about.title: Why choose Cenarioz
about.subTitle: Need a space to bring your ideas to life? We can help you find the perfect place to rent.

card1.title: Easy budgeting
card1.subTitle: Book your scenario and pay per hour, with no hidden fees for overtime.

card2.title: Experienced hosts
card2.subTitle: Connect with experienced property owners to discuss studios, technical specifications, and talent accommodations before booking.

card3.title: Infinite possibilities
card3.subTitle: Find everything from professionally equipped studios to unconventional rooms and residences.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.session1: Cenarioz is an online platform that connects property owners with tenants who want to film or hold events in their spaces. The platform allows tenants to search for filming locations, communicate with owners, and easily make payments, all in one place.
mission.session2: The main goal of Cenarioz is to provide tenants with a platform to easily find and book unique filming locations and event spaces at a more affordable price. Additionally, the platform offers property owners a new opportunity to showcase their properties and earn additional income.

enum.parking_spots: {value} parking spots available on-site: Street parking or nearby parking structure. Please confirm with the host.
